entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
